h2.b: For More Information, Please contact the following:

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1539365269959 vc_row-has-fill vc_row-no-padding

div.p: Cedar Tree Academy will continue to follow DCPS system and remain closed through April 24, 2020, with classes resuming on Monday, April 27, 2020. Cedar Tree Academy will continue our distance learning program while the school is closed. For more information, click here

h3.span: “Cedar Tree Academy creates an environment where students are eager to learn.”

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1539365242139 vc_row-has-fill vc_row-no-padding

br.h2: Cedar Tree Academy is one of DC’s Highest-performing Schools!
br.p: We are committed to academic excellence for all students. We will build the foundation for all students in a safe learning environment designed to enhance social and emotional growth, cognitive and creative development while preparing students to become active independent learners.
Cedar Tree Academy has been consistently ranked a Tier One School by the DC Public Charter School Board!

a.b: Click here to see the DC Public Charter School Board School profile that includes school transparency documents
